briefdescription.para: Prints a usage menu to be shown to a user when entering the 'help' command line parameter or when parameters are entered incorrectly.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned char *key, unsigned char *IV, int freeKey, int freeIV)
memberdef.name: freeMemory

briefdescription.para: Free up memory allocated to stored key and IV.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a location in memory containing the key
Pointer to a location in memory containing the IV
Boolean value indicating whether or not the IV memory should be freed
Boolean value indicating whether or not the Key memory should be freed

briefdescription.para: Implementation file for the cbc and cfb encryption platform. All functions, to specify key, IV, type of encrytion mode, file path or string controlled by commandline parameters.
